alert.note: Alert for Cass; Otoe; Saline (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 18 at 10:51AM CST until January 19 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow, sleet, and freezing rain. Snow and sleet accumulations of 3 to 6 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Iowa, Mills County. In Nebraska, Cass, Otoe and Saline Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Thursday. The heaviest precipitation will fall between noon and 8 PM Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will become very hazardous. Isolated power outages will be possible. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening and morning commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
